name: Windows Exploring
description:
Sentient Sam's endless phrases expounding across planar siɡˈnifikənt. 

Controls:

Number Key 1 - Center camera back to origin.

Number Key 2 - Restart everything.

WASD - move around (including up and down).

Space - move forward.
